extends GamePanels

    • Method Detail

      • validateMap

        public boolean validateMap()
                    throws InvalidMapException
        Validate the Content of Map.
        Returns:
        true if map is valid after validation else false
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - throws exception when map is invalid

      • validateContinentValue

        public boolean validateContinentValue()
                               throws InvalidMapException
        Validate continent Winning Value. Winning Value must be at-least one.
        Returns:
        true if continent value is greater than zero else false
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - throws exception when map is invalid

      • validateContinent

        public boolean validateContinent()
                          throws InvalidMapException
        This method validate the Continents. Continents at the upper parts with value and Continents at bottom parts with Territories should be equals in size and also according to names.
        Returns:
        isMapValid returns true if continents configurations are valid else false.
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - throws exception when map is invalid

      • validateTerritories

        public boolean validateTerritories()
                            throws InvalidMapException
        Validate continent. It should have at-least one territory. and territory should not be in unique Continent.
        Returns:
        true if one territory is present in one continent else false
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - invalid map exception

      • validateAdjcentTerritories

        public boolean validateAdjcentTerritories()
                                   throws InvalidMapException
        Validate Territories. It should have at-least one adjacent territory.
        Returns:
        true if adjacent territories configurations are valid else false
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - invalid map exception

      • isGraphConnected

        public boolean isGraphConnected()
                         throws InvalidMapException
        this method is used to check if Graph is Connected or not.
        Returns:
        isMapValid returns true if graph is connected else false
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - invalid map exception

      • isContinentConnected

        public boolean isContinentConnected()
                             throws InvalidMapException
        This method checks that continent's subgraph is connected or not.
        Returns:
        true if subgraph is connected else false;
        Throws:
        InvalidMapException - invalid map exception
